data.COLORNAMES

List of named colors from CSS Color Module Level 4.
Module
MEI
Used by
These other Data Types reference data.COLORNAMES
data.COLORA value in one of the following forms is expected: 1) hexadecimal RRGGBB, 2) hexadecimal RRGGBBAA, 3) CSS RGB, 4) CSS RGBA, 5) HSL, 6) HSLA, or 7) CSS color name.
Allowed Values
aliceblueHex: #f0f8ff / RGB: 240,248,255
antiquewhiteHex: #faebd7 / RGB: 250,235,215
aquaHex: #00ffff / RGB: 0,255,255

Remarks

Color names are taken from the list at https://www.w3.org/TR/css-color-4/.

All of these keywords are case-insensitive.

Declaration
<macroSpec rend="add" ident="data.COLORNAMES" module="MEI" type="dt">
<desc xml:lang="en">List of named colors from CSS Color Module Level 4.</desc>
<content>
<valList type="closed">

<remarks xml:lang="en">
<p>Color names are taken from the list at <ref target="https://www.w3.org/TR/css-color-4/">https://www.w3.org/TR/css-color-4/</ref>. </p>
<p>All of these keywords are case-insensitive.</p>
</remarks>
</macroSpec>
